altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”  
  
As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es: "Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".    De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.

description.en: The "youth graffiti" manga centers on two people in the 1990s who play the Magic the Gathering trading card game.
description.es-la: El manga de "youth graffiti" se centra en dos personas de los años 90 que juegan al juego de cartas coleccionables Magic the Gathering.
description.pt-br:
Julho de 1999, o mês em que o mundo será destruído segundo Nostradamus. O estudante do fundamental, chamado Hajime, sempre fica atrás de sua rival, a bela Sawatari. Ela não o considera como seu rival, após de ter se introduzido como tal. Ele também é um avido jogador de "Magic: The Gathering". Enquanto ele procura novas cartas ele descobre que a Sawatari também joga MTG, mas escondida. Ela foge após reconhecer ele durante uma partida do card game. No dia seguinte ele desafia ela para um duelo, com um deck especial criado para ganhar dela, prometendo ficar falado e fazer qualquer coisa que ela desejar caso perca. Uma coisa leva a outra e eles finalmente se tornam amigos. Que no fim ele lembra que este era seu objetivo inicial. 

| O título do manga é um trocadilho com a descrição da carta "Cólera de Deus" que é "Destrua todas as criaturas. Elas não podem ser regeneradas." |

description.en:
Medi is a runaway former saint who can turn into a wolf and she now lives inside a forest. One day, she took care of a cute young boy who got lost in the woods and helped return him home once the boy started feeling better.

Ten years later, a beautiful young man visited her home saying, "I'm looking for the wolf that had helped me here in the past."

His name is Claude and it seems that he's the boy she had helped before! She can't admit to him that she is the wolf and in her attempt to cover it up, she somehow ended up volunteering to help him look for the wolf instead?!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [Palcy](https://palcy.jp/comics/1306), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/7895)
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s0651f/)
description.ja:
狼に変身できる逃亡した元聖女のメディは森で暮らしていた。ある日、森に迷い込んできた かわいらしい少年を狼の姿で保護し、元気になると人里に帰してあげた。十年後、美しい青年がメディのもとを訪ねてきた。「昔、この森で助けてくれた狼を探しています。」　立派な青年・クロードは昔助けた少年だった！　メディは「狼＝自分」と言えずごまかそうとするが、クロードに狼探しを手伝ってくれと言われて！？

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪

description.en: One day, the Marquess’s daughter Julianne suddenly regained the memories of her previous life and reflected on her behavior up to this point. A life of luxury, bullying her siblings and stalking her fiancé…… A horrible personality and overweight appearance, devoted only to wrongdoings that belonged to the villainess of the novel she read in her past life. In any case if it is a "serves you right" fate from now on, then it will be after I get a beautiful body and soul! She, who thought this, started a diet together with showing a wholehearted devotion to her family —?!

description.en:
For as long as she’s known, Miwa’s been into women - and now she’s at university, it might finally be time for her to come out of her straight-passing shell. Of course, that takes a lot of confidence, and coming out is never easy - but could Saeko, her trashy popular weirdo of a friend, give her the help she needs - or just maybe, could the two of them be more alike than Miwa realises…?!  
  
This series is a reimagining of tmfly’s earlier work of the same name.

description.en:
Regnard defies expectations by enrolling in the esteemed Royal Academy of Lasarzia despite being a dropout. 

However, during the Blessing Ceremony, he receives a peculiar skill called "Blessing of Sleeping Together," leading to ridicule from classmates. 

Despite the mockery, Regnard discovers the true potential of this skill when he spends the night with Frost, an honor student.

 This revelation leads to unexpected adventures and a harem fantasy, as Regnard navigates the challenges of his newfound abilities and hidden desires.
description.ja: 神からスキルを与えられる『祝福の儀』で、『添い寝の祝福』というハズレスキルを授かった新入生のレグナード。ヘンテコスキルを授かった故に同級生からは奇異の目で見られ、クラスのいじめっ子からはパシリにされる毎日。そんな中、とあるキッカケから優等生のフロストと一夜を共にしたことによって、このスキルの真の能力を知ることになり…。一緒に添い寝で完全回復! さらに隠れた願望暴いて女のコに迫られまくり!?『努力』と『添い寝』で成り上がる、最強ハーレムファンタジー開幕!
description.pt-br: Regnard, um calouro que recebeu o "Despertar da Bênção" que concede habilidades divinas, foi agraciado com a habilidade inusitada de "Bênção do Dormir Juntos". Devido a essa habilidade estranha, ele é visto com olhares estranhos por seus colegas de classe e é constantemente abusado por um valentão da turma. No entanto, depois de passar uma noite com Frost, uma estudante exemplar, por um certo acaso, Regnard descobre o verdadeiro poder desta habilidade... Ele se recupera completamente ao dormir junto com alguém! Além disso, seus desejos ocultos são revelados, e ele é perseguido por várias garotas! "Esforço" e "Dormir Juntos" o levam a ascender, dando início a uma fantasia de harém suprema!

As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?

He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!

「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

**Note:** This is the first Complete Works set for Ito's works released in the late 90s. A new Complete Works set, titled the "Junji Ito Masterpiece Selection" is the one currently in print and the edition translated by Viz Media.

The first two volumes contain thematically linked but self-contained stories concerning Tomie - a beautiful young woman with the power to seduce and dominate any male, from small boys to elderly men. Later, the series leaves these characters behind and focuses on stand-alone gothic horror pieces.

University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!

altTitles.ja: ダメスキル【自動機能】が覚醒しました～あれ、ギルドのスカウトの皆さん、俺を「いらない」って言ってませんでした？～

description.en:
Young boy Claus was gifted with a Skill called [Auto Mode]. It is an extremely rare skill and he was so pleased when first received it...

Turns out, the skill's abilities [Auto Return] for "only to go home" and [Auto Travel] for "only to go to places that have been visited" are a completely useless ability for both combat and making money!

However, the now leveled up Claus has come to know the true nature of [Auto Mode]!

---

(JP) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2757gs/) [Light Novel](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000040012)
description.ja: １５歳の少年クラウスが教会で授かったのは発現自体が珍しいというユニークスキル！　将来は勇者か英雄かと胸を高鳴らせた少年だがその夢は無残にも打ち砕かれる…。スキル【自動機能】は[自動で家に帰れるだけ]のてんで役立たずな外れスキルだったからだ！　スキルレベルが上がればと期待を抱くが、レベル2は[自動で行ったことのある場所へ移動するだけ]、レベル３は[自動で資源を採取するだけ]とがっかりする。ところが念のためクラウスが試してみると…！？

title.en: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples

altTitles.en: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened

altTitles.pt-br: Lições após a escola para maçãs não maduras

description.en:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
description.fr: Octobre 1998, Mi-Ae est juste une collégienne normale qui fait de son mieux pour mener une vie relativement tranquille à l'école. Elle aime lire des bandes dessinées, écouter le groupe pop «The Fire Boys», et faire du karaoké. Un jour, un garçon qu'elle connaissait est transféré dans son école et commence à causer des problèmes. Sauf que peu importe ce qu'elle fait, il semblerait qu'il n'apprécie pas les efforts de Mi-Ae pour apprendre à mieux le connaître. Ça veut dire quoi au juste ?!

title.en: Imokusa Reijou desu ga Akuyaku Reisoku wo Tasuketara Kiniiraremashita

altTitles.ja: 芋くさ令嬢ですが悪役令息を助けたら気に入られました

altTitles.en: I'm an Unfashionable Lady, but When I Helped a Villainous Young Lord He Ended up Liking Me
I'm an Uncouth Lady, but I Helped the Villainous Young Lord but He Ended up Liking Me

description.en:
Agnes, who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble, happened to help Nazelbert, the duke's son, who had been betrothed to the Princess. However, the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look, he seems to hate it too. Wait, he doesn't?

This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son, who grow closer to each other.

---

description.ja: 伝統に執着する家柄のせいで古臭い格好を義務付けられ、「芋くさ令嬢」と馬鹿にされていたアニエス。あるパーティー中、王女殿下から婚約破棄された公爵の息子ナゼルを助けたことで、彼との結婚を命じられる！　しかし、命令で結婚したはずの二人は、本物の恋に落ちていき!?

altTitles.ja: 魔法先生ネギま！

altTitles.th: คุณครูจอมเวท เนกิมะ!

description.en: Ten-year-old prodigy Negi Springfield, has just graduated from magic academy, and in order to become a master mage he is sent to Japan to teach English at an all-girls middle school. But Negi has a bigger dream than just becoming a master mage. He wants to find his missing father, "The Thousand Master", the strongest mage that has ever lived. And he soon finds that searching for his father wont be as easy as he first hoped. In fact, it pushes him and his students into life-or-death battles that decides the fate of millions.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

altTitles.ja: 荒野の少年イサム

description.en:
The son of a former Japanese samurai and a Native American tracker, Isamu's parents were killed by racist crooks, and he was taken in by a highly sought after outlaw. Isamu has the potential to become the best gunslinger in the Wild West, but can he survive what comes before him?

A early popular work of Weekly Shonen Jump, and a Gekiga version of a popular emonogatari titled "Wild Boy" (荒野の少年).

title.en: Butsuri-san de Musou Shitetara Motemote ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 物理さんで無双してたらモテモテになりました

altTitles.zh-hk: 我用物理開無雙後大受女生歡迎

description.en: His harem consists of demi-human girls?! I was forced to withdraw from my world to learn magic with an alchemist, and while learning, I come upon a moment that only with my eyes could make any girl fall in love.
description.pt: O seu harém consiste de garotas demi-humanas?! “Fui trazido do meu mundo para aprender magia com um alquimista, e enquanto aprendia, cheguei ao ponto de que só de olhar conseguia fazer qualquer garota se apaixonar por mim.”
description.pt-br: O seu harém consiste de garotas demi-humana!? “Fui trazido do meu mundo para aprender magia com um alquimista, e enquanto aprendia, cheguei ao ponto de que só de olhar conseguia fazer qualquer garota se apaixonar por mim.”

description.en:
Princess Turandot is the cynosure of the Chinese Empire, and she knows it. Thus, she states she'll only marry a man of royal blood who solves her three riddles, on pain of death for failing. After many princes meet their unfortunate end by taking the challenge, enter Prince Calaf of Tartary, who's instantly besotted, and who vows to finally defeat the cold princess and win her heart.

A reimagining of Giacomo Puccini's opera, "Turandot".

--- 
TL/N: We know that "nessun dorma" translates as "let no one sleep", but the way the author mistranslated the title in Korean is a common mistake.

Due to an unidentified virus, which has affected the world, many people have turned into man-eating monsters and the screams of dying people have been swallowed by the cries of monsters.

'Kim Jongdo,' a boy who lived a grim life because he didn't receive the attention of those around him due to his inherent lack of presence, survived the apocalypse because he didn't receive attention from the monsters either, and for some reason, Kim Jongdo was also able to speak with some monsters.

While soothing loneliness by communicating with the monsters, he meets a girl 'Jo Myeong' who was in the same class as him during high school by chance.

Unlike the indifference around him, she was one of the few people who treated Kim Jongdo with interest, and that's how Kim Jongdo's "no presence" began to shake.
description.pt-br: Devido a um vírus de origem desconhecida, muitas pessoas se transformaram em monstros terríveis, e os gritos das pessoas foram engolidos pelo choro dos monstros. Kim Jongdo, que viveu uma vida sombria devido à sua falta inata de senso de existência, sobreviveu ao fim do mundo sem receber atenção mesmo dos monstros. Estranhamente, Kim Jongdo conseguiu conversar com alguns monstros. Enquanto encontrava um pouco de conforto na comunicação com os monstros, ele conheceu por acaso uma colega de escola chamada Jo Myeong. Diferentemente da indiferença que recebia, ela foi uma das poucas pessoas que demonstrou interesse genuíno por Kim Jongdo, e assim sua 'falta de existência' começou a ser abalada.

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

title.en: Sasensareta Munou Ouji wa Jitsuryoku wo Kakushitai

altTitles.ja: 左遷された無能王子は実力を隠したい 左遷された無能王子は実力を隠したい ～二度転生した最強賢者、今世では楽したいので手を抜いてたら、王家を追放された。今更帰ってこいと言われても遅い、領民に実力がバレて、実家に帰してくれないから……～

altTitles.en: The Incompetent Prince Who Has Been Banished Wants To Hide His Abilities: The Strongest Sage Who Reincarnated Twice, He Wanted To Enjoy This Life, so Took It Easy and Was Banished From the Royal Family. It’s Too Late To Be Told Come Back Now Cause the People of the Territory Have Noticed His Abilities, and Won’t Let Him Return to His Family Home

description.en:
The main character, Noah, is a reincarnated person. He was active as a sword saint in a previous life, and as a sage in another. But he’s been forced to work hard all his life, and he’s sick of being a hero!

One day, Noah dies and wakes up to find that he has been reborn as a prince. He had a high level of magical talent and the swordsmanship of a sword saint, but he didn’t want to get busy again, so Noah pretended to be incompetent with all his might.

Then, on his 15th birthday. A skill appraisal revealed that he was incompetent (actually, he was just hiding it with his concealment skill). Noah was scorned and banished. With what seemed like a gesture of warmth, his father gave him a remote territory.

“Now I’ll enjoy my second life!” Noah was enthusiastic, but he didn’t know.

Actually, the territory was in the devil’s forest, which is said to be uninhabitable. But his past life was more advanced compared to this one, and the level of human beings in this world was lower. Noah’s ability is revealed when he helps a girl who was attacked by a monster in the forest.

“Amazing!!! Noah-sama defeated a dragon with a single blow!”

“How did this happen? Ahhhhh!”

On the other hand, the royal family also noticed Noah’s ability and came to take him back, but it was too late. At that time, Noah was already being praised by the people as the lord of the Demon Forest.

description.en: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.

A collection of one-shots by Abe Yoshitoshi focusing on the theme of "memory and consciousness".

1. Furumachi (古街)
2. Jusou (樹葬)
3. Haiiki (廃域)
4. Shirasame (白雨)

description.en: The setting is 15th century Poland. It was a time when heretical ideas lead those to who possessed such a mindset to being burned at the stake for their beliefs. Rafal, a child prodigy, is expected to major in theology, the most important subject at the time, at the university. One day, however, he comes across a mysterious man, and is now studying a possible "truth" in the midst of heretical thought!
description.vi:
Bạn có tín ngưỡng nào mà không thể bẻ cong cho dù phải từ bỏ sinh mạng của mình không? Bạn có muốn giữ nguyên châm ngôn sống nào cho dù có phải trở thành kẻ thù của cả thế giới không?

Một thiên anh hùng ca tuyệt vời miêu tả những người đang tầm cầu "chân lý bị ngăn cấm". Bối cảnh ở châu Âu vào thế kỷ 15. Thời đại mà những tư tưởng dị đoan bị thiêu rụi.

Nhân vật chính, thần đồng Rafal, được mọi người kỳ vọng sẽ theo học chuyên ngành Thần Học ở trường Đại học, ngành được coi là quan trọng nhất vào thời điểm đó. Tuy nhiên một ngày nọ, một người đàn ông bí ẩn xuất hiện vốn đang nghiên cứu một "chân lý" nào đó trong những tư tưởng dị đoan...!

Truyện #2 giải thưởng Manga Taisho 2021. Truyện được đề xuất bởi Iwaaki Hitoshi, tác giả của "Ký Sinh Thú" và "Historie".
description.es-la: El escenario es la Polonia del siglo XV. Fue un momento en que las ideas heréticas llevaban a quienes poseían tal mentalidad a ser quemados en la hoguera por sus creencias. Se espera que el protagonista, Rafal, un niño prodigio, se especialice en teología, la asignatura más importante en ese momento, en la universidad. Un día, sin embargo, se encuentra con un hombre misterioso, ¡y ahora está estudiando una posible "verdad" en medio de un pensamiento herético!
description.pt-br: O cenário é a Polônia do século XV. Foi uma época em que ideias heréticas levaram aqueles que possuíam tal mentalidade a serem queimados na fogueira por suas crenças. Rafal, um menino prodígio, deve se formar em teologia, o assunto mais importante da época, na universidade. Um dia, porém, ele se depara com um homem misterioso, e agora está estudando uma possível "verdade" no meio do pensamento herético!

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

there's an old legend in Sereong's family: their flute 'Manpa' will turn into a person if you care for it with enough love! But Sereong doesn't believe in this legend and plans to sell Manpa.... But it was then when Manpa turns into a human and tells Sereong he can grant her wish.

A romance between one who grants miracles and one who doesn't believe in miracles.

altTitles.en: The Man Who Cleans Up Makeup

description.en:
Studious and plain university student, Kim Yeseul, becomes the muse of genius makeup artist, Cheon Yuseong.  
  
[Official Indonesian Version](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/makeupman/list?title_no=1579)

altTitles.ja: 竹光侍

description.en:
Early one New Year's morning, the rounin Senou Souichirou appears in Edo's Katagi tenements.  
  
Initially, the inhabitants regard him with fear and suspicion: Kankichi, the carpenter's son, thinks he may not be human; the neighborhood cats remark that he reeks of blood. But soon Souichirou pawns his sword, and, with a bamboo replica at his waist, settles down to a quiet life as the neighborhood school-teacher.  
  
Months pass, and all appears to be well. But trouble will not leave the Katagi tenements alone …  
  
---
- **Won the 15th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2011**

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

altTitles.ja: 忘却バッテリー

description.en: Geniuses who made a name for themselves in middle school baseball but have been away from baseball accidentally come together at an obscure metropolitan high school. Haruka Kiyomine is a pitcher with an unbeatable arm. His partner, the shrewd catcher, Kei Kaname, is now an amateur due to amnesia!. And then there are the two of them. And those who were defeated and scattered by the two in the past… The story of their high school baseball game is about to begin again!

title.en: Konbini Goutou kara Tasuketa Jimi Tenin ga, Onaji Kurasu no Ubu de Kawaii Gyaru datta

altTitles.ja: コンビニ強盗から助けた地味店員が、同じクラスのうぶで可愛いギャルだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Conveni Goutou Kara Tasuketa Jimi Tenin ga, Onaji Class no Ubu de Kawaii Gal datta

altTitles.en: The Sobbing Clerk I Helped From the Convenience Store’s Robbery Is in Fact a Naive and Cute Gal From My Class

description.en:
_"Will you stay over at my house starting today?"_ 

Riku Kuromine, a second-year high school student, became despondent after being rejected by his childhood friend. He happens to enter a convenience store and saves a clerk who was being attacked by a robber. The clerk turns out to be Ayana Hoshimiya, the most popular and beautiful gal in school. As a result of this incident, Ayana asks Riku to protect her from a stalker and they start living together under the guise of him protecting her as she lives alone.
description.ja:
**見た目は派手ギャル、中身は超絶うぶ!? “うぶかわ”ギャル×非リア、禁断の同棲ラブコメ!!**

「今日から、あたしの家に……泊まる？」高校二年生の黒峰リクは、幼馴染に振られて自暴自棄になったところ、偶然入ったコンビニで強盗に襲われていた店員を助ける。その店員は学校でいちばんモテる美人ギャル・星宮彩奈だった。この件をきっかけに星宮からストーカー被害を相談され、一人暮らしの彼女を守る名目でふたりは同棲することになり――!?
description.pt-br:
“Você gostaria de ficar em minha casa esta noite?”
Riku Kuromine, um aluno do segundo ano do ensino médio, ficou triste depois de ser rejeitado por sua amiga de infância. Por coincidência, ele entra em uma loja de conveniência e salva uma funcionária que estava sendo roubada. A funcionária era na verdade Ayana Hoshimiya, a garota mais popular e atraente da escola. Como resultado desse incidente, Ayana pede a Riku para passar a noite em sua casa e protegê-la de um perseguidor.

title.en: Last Karte - Houjuuigakusha Touma Kenshou no Kioku

altTitles.ja: Last Karte
ラストカルテ-法獣医学者 当麻健匠の記憶-

description.en: Kenshou Touma is a ordinary high schooler with worries and dreams about his future, just like everyone else. One day, he comes across a large number of crows in the park that have died an unnatural death. And while involved in that incident, a certain superpower manifests in him...

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.ja: 財閥家の末息子

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

altTitles.ja: 入学傭兵

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

description.en:
21-year-old Jang AnCheol has been on fast-track to success when he is cursed by a classmate he had bullied 3 years ago in high school. Now placed in loser’s body he had bullied 3 years ago, he is tasked with stopping 4 “Life Completely Ruined” incidents as well as rehabilitating his past self in order to undo the curse. How will he navigate his way through his past self and his cronies torments?   
  
*From the author of "Lookism" and artist of "Free Draw".*
description.pt-br: Jang AnChul, de 21 anos, está no caminho certo para o sucesso quando é amaldiçoado por um colega de classe que ele havia intimidado no colégio. Agora colocado no corpo do perdedor que ele havia intimidado 3 anos atrás, ele tem a tarefa de parar 4 incidentes de “Loser Life”, bem como reabilitar seu próprio passado para desfazer a maldição. Como ele navegará em seu caminho através de seu eu passado e dos tormentos de seus amigos? Do autor de “Lookism” e artista de “Free Draw”.

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Astray R

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY R

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED: Astray R

description.en: Junk dealer Lowe Guele travels the universe with the Gundam Astray Red Frame he finds in the destroyed colony of Heliopolis!
